title: Share of people owning microwave ovens in Germany 2008 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, and finally slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2015.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 80.0 was reported at Year 2008, and 2010
The lowest Share of respondents, of value 65.0 was reported at Year 2017
